00068 struct pool : boost::pool<>
00069 {
00070         typedef std::list< numeric::interval<long>, fast_pool_allocator< numeric::interval<long> > > pool_lii;  
00072 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00073     thread_specific_ptr<pool_lii> plii_;                        
00074 #else
00075     std::auto_ptr<pool_lii> plii_;                                      
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 
00083     pool() : boost::pool<>(1)
00084     {
00085         plii_.reset(new pool_lii());
00086     }
00087         
00088         
00096     block_base * top(void * p)
00097     {
00098         pool_lii::reverse_iterator i;
00099         
00100         for (i = plii_->rbegin(); i != plii_->rend(); i ++)
00101             if (in((long)(p), * i))
00102                 break;
00103 
00104         plii_->erase(i.base(), plii_->end());
00105         
00106         return (block_base *)(plii_->rbegin()->lower());
00107     }
00108     
00109         
00117     void * allocate(std::size_t s)
00118     {
00119         void * p = ordered_malloc(s);
00120         
00121         plii_->push_back(numeric::interval<long>((long) p, long((char *)(p) + s)));
00122         
00123         return p;
00124     }
00125 
00126         
00134     void deallocate(void * p, std::size_t s)
00135     {
00136         pool_lii::reverse_iterator i;
00137         
00138         for (i = plii_->rbegin(); i != plii_->rend(); i ++)
00139             if (in((long)(p), * i))
00140                 break;
00141 
00142         plii_->erase(i.base(), plii_->end());
00143         ordered_free(p, s);
00144     }
00145 };

00152 class block_base : public sp_counted_base
00153 {
00154 public:
00155     bool init_;                                                                         
00157         intrusive_stack ptrs_;                                                  
00158         intrusive_list inits_;                                                  
00160     intrusive_list::node block_tag_;                                    
00161     intrusive_list::node init_tag_;                                     
00164     block_base() : init_(false)
00165     {
00166         inits_.push_back(& init_tag_); 
00167     }
00168 
00169     static pool pool_;                                                          
00171 protected:
00172     virtual void dispose()                                                  {}                          
00173     virtual void * get_deleter( std::type_info const & ti ) { return 0; }       
00174 };

00176 
00177 pool block_base::pool_;

00180 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00181 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00182 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00183 
00184 #define CONSTRUCT_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00185         template <BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00186                 text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0)) : elem_(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)) {}                                                                                                                                                                                                            
00187 
00192 template <typename T>
00193     class block : public block_base
00194     {
00195         typedef T data_type;
00196 
00197         T elem_;                                                                        
00199     public:
00200         class roofof;
00201         friend class roofof;
00202 
00203                 block() : elem_() 
00204         {
00205         }
00206 
00207         BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, CONSTRUCT_BLOCK, block)
00208 
00209 
00210                 
00214         data_type * element()                           { return & elem_; }
00215         operator data_type & ()             { return * element(); }
00216         operator data_type const & () const { return * element(); }
00217 
00218         virtual ~block()                                        
00219         { 
00220             dispose(); 
00221         }
00222 
00223     public:
00228         class roofof
00229         {
00230             block * p_;                                                 
00232         public:
00239             roofof(data_type * p) : p_(sh::roofof((data_type block::*)(& block::elem_), p)) {}
00240             
00241                         
00246             operator block * () const { return p_; }
00247         };
00248 
00249         
00257         void * operator new (size_t s)
00258         {
00259             return pool_.allocate(s);
00260         }
00261         
00262 
00269         void operator delete (void * p)
00270         {
00271             pool_.deallocate(p, sizeof(block));
00272         }
00273     };

00283         block();
00284 
00285     public:
